footerText: Â© {{year}} The Art of Healing. All rights reserved.
heroTitle: A Sacred Encounter with Ancestral Medicines
heroSubtitle: Discover how Ayahuasca can transform your life, bringing you clarity, emotional healing, and a renewed connection with the universe. Join us in this transformative experience, where tradition meets expert guidance for an unforgettable journey.
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is a sacred ancestral Amazonian beverage, composed of two master plants: the Ayahuasca vine (Banisteriopsis caapi) and Chacruna leaves (Psychotria viridis). Together, they create a powerful brew that opens the doors of spiritual perception, allowing for deep emotional and psychological healing.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: The Ayahuasca experience is an introspective journey that can reveal deep patterns in our subconscious, release emotional blockages, and offer a clear vision of our life's purpose. Each ceremony is a unique and personal dialogue with your own being.
spiritualMasterTitle: A Spiritual Teacher, Not a Drug
spiritualMasterDescription: We honor Ayahuasca as a master plant and a spiritual guide, not as a recreational substance. Our approach is based on deep respect for tradition and a commitment to a safe, controlled, and sacred environment for all participants.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: Gain a clearer perspective on your life, relationships, and purpose. Ayahuasca helps you understand and resolve internal conflicts.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: Release traumas, fears, and emotional patterns that limit you. The medicine guides you in a process of healing from the root.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: Experience a deep connection with yourself, with nature, and with the universe. Feel the unity and love that resides in everything.
groupCeremonyDescription: A space for collective healing where the group's energy enhances the individual experience.
privateCeremonyDescription: An intimate and personalized experience for those seeking more focused and profound work.
guidesSubtitle: Meet the hearts that hold the space and accompany you on your journey.
contactCommunityText: Follow our social networks to stay updated on upcoming ceremonies, retreats, and valuable content that will help you on your path of healing and self-discovery.
exploreMedicineDescription: Discover the origins, benefits, and transformative power of Ayahuasca.
exploreGuidesDescription: Meet the facilitators who will accompany you with love and respect in your process.
preparationCtaDescription: Good preparation is key to a profound experience. Find everything you need to know here.
loginSubtext: Sign in to continue your journey.
googleSuccessDescription: You have signed in with your Google account.
registerSubtext: Join our community to access exclusive content.
registerSuccessDescription: We've sent you an email to verify your account.

emailSubjectPlaceholder: Important announcement about the next ceremony...

editGuideDescription: Modify the guide's information. The changes will be reflected immediately.
deleteGuideConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the guide from the database.
mediaRequiredDescription: Please upload a file or provide a URL.
editCeremonyDescription: Modify the ceremony details. The changes will be saved for all users.
addCeremonyDescription: Set up a new ceremony to appear on the site.
deleteCeremonyConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this ceremony?
deleteCeremonyConfirmDescription: This action is irreversible and will delete all associated data.
finishCeremonyConfirmDescription: The ceremony will be moved to the past events section. This action can be reversed.
ceremonyMovedToPast: It has been moved to the past events section.
chatbotWelcome: Hello! I am your Spiritual Guide. I'm here to help you on your path of healing and self-knowledge. How can I guide you today?
chatbotError: I'm sorry, I'm having trouble connecting right now. Please try again later.
chatHistorySubtitle: Review all user conversations with the Spiritual Guide.
allConversationsDescription: Explore past interactions to better understand your users.
fullPlanUpTo: Full contribution until the day of the event.
preparationProcessDescription: Days before, focus on a clean diet and a clear mind. Set your intentions.
ceremonyProcessDescription: During the ceremony, surrender to the experience with trust and openness.
experienceProcessDescription: Navigate your inner world with the guidance of the medicine and facilitators.
integrationProcessDescription: Afterwards, reflect on your visions and apply the learnings in your daily life.
dietSubtitle: A clean diet prepares your body and mind, allowing the medicine to work more deeply.
mentalPrepSubtitle: Your mental state is as important as your diet. Cultivate calmness and intention.
meditationDescription: Practice meditation to calm the mind and open the heart. Silence connects you with your inner self.
intentionsDescription: Reflect on what you seek to heal or understand. A clear intention guides your journey.
reflectionDescription: Write down your thoughts, fears, and hopes. It's a powerful tool for self-discovery.
emotionalHealingDescription: Ayahuasca can bring suppressed emotions to the surface. Allow yourself to feel them without judgment. It is part of the process of purification and release. Trust that you have the strength to face whatever arises.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony?
whatToBringSubtitle: Prepare these items to ensure your comfort and well-being during the experience.
comfortItemsList: Blanket or sleeping bag and pillow
A personal object of power or meaning (optional)
essentialsList: A journal and pen for integration
A change of clothes for the next day
prohibitedFoodsList: Citrus fruits (orange, lemon) on the day of the ceremony
promptRegisterDescription: Create an account to reserve your spot in our ceremonies and access exclusive content.
allCeremoniesSubtitle: Explore upcoming gatherings and events that have already marked a before and after in the lives of many.
noUpcomingCeremonies: There are no active ceremonies at this time. Please check back soon.
guidesPageSubtitle: Our guides are the heart of The Art of Healing. With years of experience and deep respect for the traditions, they will accompany you every step of your journey, holding a space of trust, love, and transformation.
guide_desc_wilson_alfaro: Spiritual guide with a deep connection to Amazonian traditions. Trained in the Peruvian Amazon, Wilson Alfaro brings an ancestral understanding of Ayahuasca and its healing power. His experience facilitates a safe and trustworthy space for personal exploration.
guide_desc_jacob: Spiritual master trained in the Peruvian Amazon, where he learned the sacred use of ancestral medicine directly from healers. With a serene and profound presence, he guides ceremonies at Casa Trinitos (Guanacaste), where he accompanies transformation processes.
guide_desc_harley: Specialist in medical care and first aid, with experience in guided meditations and therapeutic massages. Her calm and professional presence ensures a safe environment throughout the ceremony, providing confidence and support to both the team and the participants.
guide_desc_johanna: Guardian of the medicine trained in the Peruvian Amazon. Providing ceremonies in Colombia and Costa Rica, her presence brings security, support, and balance between the physical and spiritual, upholding the ceremonial space with firmness, care, and a deep connection to female healing.
mustBeLoggedInToView: You must be logged in to view this page.
mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to access this feature.
questionnaireDescription: Your safety is our priority. Please complete this questionnaire with complete honesty. The information is confidential and will help us ensure your experience is safe and beneficial.
questionnaireMedicalConditions: Do you have any pre-existing medical conditions (heart problems, high/low blood pressure, diabetes, etc.)?
questionnaireMedicalConditionsDetails: If yes, please detail your medical conditions.
questionnaireMedication: Are you currently taking any medications, supplements, or herbs (including antidepressants, anxiolytics, etc.)?
questionnaireMedicationDetails: If yes, please list all medications and supplements.
questionnaireMentalHealth: Do you have a history of mental health conditions (schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, psychosis, etc.)?
questionnaireMentalHealthDetails: If yes, please describe your mental health history.
questionnaireExperience: Have you had any previous experience with Ayahuasca or other psychoactive medicinal plants?
questionnaireExperienceDetails: If yes, please briefly describe your previous experiences.
questionnaireIntention: What is your main intention or what are you looking to heal/explore with this experience?
questionnaireIntentionPlaceholder: e.g., I'm seeking clarity in my career, I want to heal a family relationship, I want to overcome a fear...
errorRequiredDetails: If your answer is 'Yes', please provide details.
questionnaireSuccessDescription: Your answers have been saved securely. Thank you for your honesty.
questionnaireErrorDescription: Could not save your answers. Please try again.
dialogSuccessDescription: You have completed the first step. We now invite you to review our preparation guide to ensure the best possible experience.
questionnaireCompletedDescription: Thank you for completing the questionnaire. You can review your answers below or proceed to the preparation guide.
inactivateCeremonyConfirmDescription: The ceremony will not be visible to normal users. You can reactivate it later.
whatsappInviteMessage: Hello! I'm inviting you to complete your health questionnaire for the ceremony with The Art of Healing. It's an important step to ensure your experience is safe and profound. You can complete it here: [LINK]
editProfileDescription: Keep your information up to date.
emailUpdatedSuccessDesc: You may need to verify your new email address.
enterPasswordToConfirm: Please enter your current password to confirm.
passwordRequired: Password is required for this action.
